mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLANNER WHERE PL_STATUS='Y' AND STATUS='Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT P.PLAN_NO,P.PLAN_NAME,P.PLAN_EXP,P.CHANGE_NAME,P.COUNT,LOCATION_NAME,SIGUNGU_NAME FROM PLANNER P JOIN DISTRICTS ON(AREA_CODE=LCODE_NO) LEFT JOIN CITY ON(SIGUNGUCODENO = SIGUNGU_CODE_NO) WHERE P.PL_STATUS = 'Y' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND (LOCATION_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR SIGUNGU_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
SELECT P.*, TOUR.TOUR_NAME, TOUR.MAP_X,TOUR.MAP_Y FROM PLAN_DETAIL P JOIN TOUR ON(REF_TNO = TOUR_NO) WHERE REF_PNO = #{pno}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, PP.* FROM(SELECT PR.*, NICK_NAME FROM PLAN_REPLY PR JOIN MEMBER ON(REF_UNO = USER_NO) WHERE REF_PNO = ${pno} ORDER BY PR.CREATE_DATE DESC) PP) WHERE RN BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
